samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-jquery-application-toastr
samples.title: Toastr Application Customizer
samples.description: Sample SharePoint Framework application customizer extension that shows toast notifications configured from a SharePoint list. Demonstrates jQuery module loading, barrel configuration, promise chaining, and localStorage caching.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-jquery-field-itemorder
samples.title: Item Order
samples.description: Sample SharePoint Framework field customizer extension that enables reordering of list items through intuitive drag and drop directly in your list view. Demonstrates the use of jQuery and jQuery UI, custom property JSON, and PnPJS Batching.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-js-application-alert-message
samples.title: Application Alert Message
samples.description: This application customizer will display the alert message based on the items from the list.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-js-application-analytics
samples.title: Google Analytics Application Customizer
samples.description: In this sample is possible to see how to implement Google Analytics through SPFx Extensions Application Customizers

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-js-application-appinsights
samples.title: Injecting Javascript with Sharepoint Framework Extensions - Azure Application Insights
samples.description: Sample SharePoint Framework extension project injecting Javascript code to enable Azure App Insights monitoring and statistics.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-js-application-appinsights-advanced
samples.title: JS Application AppInsights Advanced
samples.description: This application customizer will track the pageviews using Azure App Insights. The customizer will track the react routing which is used in SPA, in SharePoint Online it tracks the navigation between the news post which is not the actual post back.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-js-application-dynamically-importing-styles
samples.title: Optimize CSS/SCSS Style Bundling and Dynamic Loading of Styles
samples.description: This example illustrates how style files can be dynamically bundled into multiple .js bundle files and then be individually imported at runtime.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-js-application-graph-client
samples.title: GraphClient from Modern Teamsite
samples.description: Simple example to call the Graph via the new GraphHttpClient (No ADAL) for getting the group title, mail, and description.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-js-application-header-toggler
samples.title: Site Header Toggler
samples.description: This application customizer adds a toggle button on all the Modern Pages which will toggle (show/hide) the Site Header, pulling the content to the top and giving more reading space for the users.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-js-application-intranet-searchbox
samples.title: Intranet Search Box
samples.description: This demonstrates how to use an SPFx Application Customiser to inject an additional search box into the header of each page, which uses the "Search Settings" (at either the Site Collection or Sub-Site level) to determine the redirect page.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-js-application-listdrivenplaceholders
samples.title: List-Driven Placeholders
samples.description: This solution deploys a list that allows end users to manage content that will appear in placeholders, via a SharePoint Framework application customizer extension.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-js-application-microsoft-clarity
samples.title: Microsoft Clarity for modern SharePoint
samples.description: Microsoft Clarity will gives you the recording of the sessions and heat maps of the user interaction with the site, this will help to find and fix the areas of your pages that are not working as you expect

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-js-application-redirect
samples.title: Redirect Application Customizers
samples.description: Redirect from URL based on mapping from a list on the site. Can be used to automatically redirect from pages to other locations.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-js-application-run-once
samples.title: Run Once SharePoint Framework application customizer
samples.description: Sample SharePoint Framework application customizer showing how you can run code once, and then remove the customizer at the end. The code as-is expects to be installed as a site scoped custom action.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-js-command-clone
samples.title: Clone ListView Command Set
samples.description: Sample SharePoint Framework listview command set extension that allows users to clone one or more list items. Demonstrates conditional visibility, PnPJS requests, PnPJS Batching, and field specific formats for rest operations.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-js-command-convert-to-pdf
samples.title: Convert documents to PDF using Azure function
samples.description: Sample SPFx list view command set extension that converts the selected documents to PDF using Microsoft Graph.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-js-command-copy-classic-link
samples.title: Copy Classic Link Extension
samples.description: Sample SharePoint Framework list view command set extension that copies the classic link (path) of a selected item. Uses copy-to-clipboard library, toastr and sweet alert for notifications.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-js-command-hide-commands
samples.title: Hide Commands
samples.description: This command-set can be used to hide other 'out-of-the-box' commands on list views.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-js-command-item-permissions
samples.title: Unique Item Permissions Command Set Customizer
samples.description: The sample illustrates creation of a shortcut command to redirect user to selected item's permission page.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-js-command-lock-item
samples.title: Lock Item Command Set Customizer
samples.description: The sample illustrates the ability to lock/unlock selected item/document for the current user. The lock is implemented as item's unique permissions set to Full Control for current user only. The lock is available only for items that inherit permissions from the parent. Items with unique permissions can't be locked as we can't unlock them correctly later on. All other permissions are deleted. The Command is available only for users who have "Manage Permissions" permissions for the list/document library.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-js-command-selecteditems-export
samples.title: Export Selected Items to Excel
samples.description: Exports selected items to excel spreadsheet in xlsx format, with the columns from the current modern list view.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-js-field-animated-progress
samples.title: Animated Progress Field
samples.description: Displays an animated progress bar component

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-js-field-conditionalformatting
samples.title: Conditional formatting SharePoint Framework field customizer
samples.description: Sample SharePoint Framework field customizer that applies Excel-like conditional formatting to numeric fields based on their values.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-js-field-taskpriority
samples.title: Priority Field SharePoint Framework field customizer
samples.description: Sample SharePoint Framework field customizer that shows how to apply conditional color formatting to the values in a Priority field based on their value.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-js-field-weather
samples.title: Weather SharePoint Framework field customizer
samples.description: Sample SharePoint Framework field customizer showing weather conditions for the given location.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-js-guest-message
samples.title: Guest Message
samples.description: SharePoint Application customizer that allow you to display a message to your External users.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-js-share-to-teams
samples.title: Share to Teams
samples.description: Share to teams helps us to share files along with folders in document library it also alows us to share pages in the site pages library and last but not the least it allows sharing list items to teams channels or group.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-aadtokenprovider-bot
samples.title: AAD Token Provider Bot Extension
samples.description: This sample demonstrates how to integrate a bot within a SharePoint Online portal supporting authentication to access Azure AD protected APIs like Microsoft graph resources. Behind the scenes, this sample uses the AADTokenProvider utility class provided with SPFx > 1.6.0 to seamlessly get an access token for the current user and send it to the bot. This way, the user is not prompted anymore for login to interact with the bot, improving overall experience.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-app-announcements
samples.title: Announcements SharePoint Framework application customizer
samples.description: Sample SharePoint Framework application customizer showing urgent organizational announcements.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-application-alerts
samples.title: Alerts Application Customizers
samples.description: This application customizer provides you the ability to show notifications on the pages in the top / header area.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-application-announcements
samples.title: Announcements SharePoint Framework Application Customizer
samples.description: SharePoint Framework application customizer displaying an information banner using office-fabric-ui MessageBar.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-application-botframework-chat
samples.title: Bot Framework Chat App Customizer
samples.description: SPFx application extension that uses the Bot Framework React Webchat Component to render a Bot Framework chat window

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-application-breadcrumb
samples.title: Breadcrumb application customizer
samples.description: This sample shows how to create a breadcrumb element and append it to your site via the SharePoint Framework Application Customizer extension.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-application-collab-footer
samples.title: Collaboration Footer Application Customizers
samples.description: This application customizer provides you the ability to include a footer designed for normal and group associated teams sites.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-react-application-customizer-feedback-widget
samples.title: Sticky Feedback Widget Application Customizer
samples.description: An SPFx Application Customizer Extension placed in the bottom placeholder which allows users to input their feedbacks without scrolling down to the end of the page.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-application-duetasks
samples.title: Overdue Tasks Application Customizer
samples.description: The sample illustrates how to display a warning message that current user has overdue tasks.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-application-festivals
samples.title: Festivals Extension
samples.description: Sample SharePoint Framework application customizer adds a festival animation to the pages. At the moment this extension has capability of display 2 festivals (Christmas and Diwali) however, more can be added very easily.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-application-grouplinks
samples.title: Groups external links
samples.description: This sample shows how to render a header navbar with some external links related to the Group the site is in, i.e Group calendar, Notebook, Inbox, People...

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-application-injectcss
samples.title: CSS Injection
samples.description: This sample shows how to inject a custom Cascading Style Sheet (CSS) on modern pages.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-application-logo-festoon
samples.title: Logo Festoon
samples.description: This simple SPFx extension can be used to decorate you SPO site logo with a festoon image of your choice. Keep users engaged by adding a personal touch to your site.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-application-machine-translations
samples.title: Machine Translations
samples.description: This application customizer lets you translate the text on a SharePoint page using the Translator Text API of Microsoft Azure.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-fx-extensions-react-application-messagebanner
samples.title: React Message Banner
samples.description: A react Message Banner sample, allows to add a custom banner message to your SharePoint Online modern sites.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-react-application-my-flows-list
samples.title: My Flows List
samples.description: Application extension that allows the user to check list of flows and their current status and details.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-react-application-my-lists-notifications
samples.title: My Lists Notifications
samples.description: This application extension alows user receive notifications from selected lists or libraries

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-application-myfavourites
samples.title: My Favourites Application Customizer
samples.description: Sample SharePoint Framework application customizer extension that shows favourite links using office ui fabric panel. Fabric UI React components used include - panel, dialog, list and spinner.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-application-myfollowedsites
samples.title: My Followed Sites Application Customizer
samples.description: Sample SharePoint Framework application customizer extension that shows current user followed sites across tenant using office ui fabric panel.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-application-nav-search-driven
samples.title: Search driven navigation
samples.description: SPFx application search driven navigation and permission side panel.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-application-news-ticker
samples.title: News Ticker
samples.description: An SPFx Extension that displays news as a running text at the top of every modern page.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-application-office-groups-nav
samples.title: Modern Team Sites (Office Groups) Navigation
samples.description: The sample illustrates how to use AadHttpClient to request Groups information from Microsoft Graph

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-application-page-comments-sentiment
samples.title: Application Customiser sample using Text Analytics API
samples.description: This sample shows how to use the Text Analytics API (Cognitive Services) to render a rating icon based on the different comments in page.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-application-page-related-bing-news
samples.title: Application Customiser sample using Bing Search API
samples.description: This sample shows how to use the Bing Search API (Cognitive Services) to get news article related with the current page. That relation is set using the value of a specific Managed metadata field in the page.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-application-personal-assistant
samples.title: Personal Assistant - OpenAI Function Calling with Microsoft Graph
samples.description: This sample is chatbot that provides information to the current logged in user.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-application-portal-footer
samples.title: Portal Footer Application Customizers
samples.description: This application customizer provides you the ability to include a footer designed for communication sites.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-application-pva-bot
samples.title: Power Virtual Agents Bot Host
samples.description: Adds footer to launch a Power Virtual Agents chatbot window from any page.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-application-qna-chat
samples.title: QnA Chatbot
samples.description: SPFx application extension that uses Azure QnA cognitive services to efficiently answer FAQs.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-application-regions-footer
samples.title: Regions Footer Application Customizer
samples.description: Sample SharePoint Framework application customizer showing how to create a custom footer for modern pages, in order to show data about an area manager for a specific region.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-application-search-dynamicdata
samples.title: Connecting SPFx Extensions with Web Parts using Dynamic Data
samples.description: This example shows how to connect Spfx extensions with Spfx Webparts using Dynamic Data Feature

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-application-sitepagecoremetadata
samples.title: Tenant Global NavBar
samples.description: Sample SharePoint Framework application customizer to display the core metadata of a Site Page such as Author,Editor, Created date and Modified date in the footer of the page.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-application-sites-hubsite-switcher
samples.title: Sites in Hub site switcher
samples.description: This sample shows how to get the sites that are part of a Hub Site, and renders a drop down to jump directly into a site. The customiser only renders if the site is a Hub site.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-application-team-archived-notification
samples.title: Displaying notification if a team is set as archived
samples.description: This sample demonstrates how to check is current team linked to team site set as archived from Microsoft Graph API. If team is archived, notification is diplayed to end-user on header placeholder.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-application-tenant-global-navbar
samples.title: Tenant Global NavBar Application Customizer
samples.description: Sample SharePoint Framework application customizer showing how to create a tenant global NavBar and Footer NavBar for modern sites, reading menu items from the Term Store.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-application-tfl-status
samples.title: Transport for London (TfL) Status
samples.description: This sample is chatbot that provides information about Transport for London (TfL) status.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-application-weather-widget
samples.title: Weather Application Customizer Extension
samples.description: SPFx Weather Application Customizer Extension in the top placeholder

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-application-webhooks-notification
samples.title: Webhooks Notification Application Customizer
samples.description: Sample SharePoint Framework application customizer showing how to leverage the SharePoint webhooks capabilities, in order to show toast notifications. The libraries used by this solution are Socket.io, sp pnp js, moment.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-bot-framework-secure
samples.title: Bot Framework Secure
samples.description: This sample will show you how to embed a Bot Framework bot into a SharePoint web site with security consideration.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-bot-framework-sso
samples.title: Bot Framework SSO
samples.description: This sample will show you how to embed a Bot Framework bot into a SharePoint web site with SSO.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-command-addfolders
samples.title: Add Folders Command
samples.description: Sample SharePoint Framework list view command set extension to create folders that can be all at the current location (parallel) or nested (one after another).

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-react-command-change-page-layouttype
samples.title: Change Page Layout Command Extension
samples.description: Listview command extension that is available only for the Site Pages library to change the layout type. If the page is Article, it can be changed to Home which will remove the page title placeholder and vice versa.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-command-convert-to-pdf
samples.title: Save and convert as PDF by PnP
samples.description: A global list customizer which adds functionality to all document libraries in SharePoint Online to convert one or more documents in-place to PDF, or download one or more documents as a PDF. When selecting multiple documents for download they will be downloaded as a zip file. The converter uses built in API's of converting to PDF.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-react-command-copy-move-items
samples.title: Copy/Move Item(s)
samples.description: Displays a command button named **Copy/Move Item(s)** in all the custom lists

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-react-command-copy-pnp-search-webpart-settings
samples.title: Copy PnP search results webpart settings
samples.description: This list view command set, helps in copying the settings of the PnP search results web part present on a page to the settings of the  PnP search results web part present on the selected pages.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-command-custom-command-bar
samples.title: Custom Command Bar Command Set Customizer
samples.description: The sample illustrates how to display custom Command Bar when Command Set Button is pressed.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-command-demote-news
samples.title: Demote News to Page
samples.description: Sample SharePoint Framework list view command set extension to demote a previously promoted News page.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-command-dialog
samples.title: Custom Dialog Sample with Command View Set
samples.description: This sample shows how to create Custom Dialogs using @microsoft/sp-dialog package in the context of Command View Set. You can use also custom dialogs with client-side web parts or with any SharePoint Framework component types.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-command-direct-link
samples.title: Get a direct link to a document or folder
samples.description: Sample SharePoint Framework (SPFx) solution which gives the end-user the ability to just get a regular, simple link to a document or folder in the modern SharePoint document libraries. This is done using a CommandSet.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-command-directions
samples.title: Directions SharePoint Framework list view command set
samples.description: Sample SharePoint Framework list view command set showing travel directions to the given location using Google Maps.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-command-discuss-now
samples.title: Discuss Now Command Set
samples.description: Sample SharePoint Framework command set showing how to create a new meeting to discuss about a document selected in the current list view of a document library.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-command-file-size-viewer
samples.title: File Size Viewer sample with Command View Set
samples.description: This sample shows how to create Command View Set working with single and multiple files selection. Once selected some files, it will show file sizes representation using a React D3 TreeMap component. This sample also shows how to integrate D3.js third party components within SharePoint Framework.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-command-folder-select
samples.title: Folder Selection
samples.description: This extension creates a callout with a dropdown that allows users to select from a list of top level folders in a document library. After selecting the folder they can use the button to navigate to that folder.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-react-command-follow-document
samples.title: Follow Document
samples.description: This solution has the goal to easily identify/follow user key documents from all Tenant and easily access them in Modern Pages.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-command-form-settings
samples.title: Form Settings Command View Set
samples.description: This sample shows how you can redirect default SharePoint list forms (New,Edit,Display) to different pages.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-command-get-thumbnail
samples.title: Get Thumbnail List Item Command View Set
samples.description: This Command Set uses Microsoft Graph API to get the Thumbnail URL, of selected size (small, medium, large), for any file stored in a SharePoint Document Library.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-command-image-editor
samples.title: Image Editor Command Set
samples.description: This command set allows quick edit images located in Document Library.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-command-mail-view-as-image
samples.title: Mail Current View as Image
samples.description: Sample SharePoint Framework list view command set extension that emails the current view to selected (external or internal user) and also saves the same image in SharePoint. Uses html2canvas library, pnp spfx controls, pnp js and office fabric ui react.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-command-manage-list-subscriptions
samples.title: React-Manage-List-Subscriptions
samples.description: Demonstrates managing the list subscriptions (sharepoint webhooks) and action to renew the webhook expiration date using Rest calls.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-command-page-model-pnpjs
samples.title: Modern Page Model with PnP/PnPjs
samples.description: A SPFx extension using @pnp/sp that allow creating Modern Pages based on prefilled modern pages marked as "Page Model", inside the Site Pages Library, and code defined pages. Users can select a Modern page as Model just setting a custom property page named "Is Model" to "Yes". People often need to create periodically editorial pages with the same composition, sections structure and webpart configuration, in order to give users the same users experience between pages with different contents but with the same communicative purpose

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-command-print
samples.title: Print List Item Command View Set
samples.description: This sample shows how you can print list items using different templates, site admin can add, edit or remove templates and users can print items based on those templates.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-command-qrcode
samples.title: Generate QR Code List Item Command View Set
samples.description: Generates a printable QR code which links to a SharePoint list item.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-command-share-pnpjs
samples.title: Multishare Command Extension with PnPJs
samples.description: The sample is an custom action only active when multiple items are selected.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-fx-extensions-react-command-share-to-teams
samples.title: Associated Sites Links
samples.description: Web part that will display links to all associated sites that registered to the current site. Current site should be a hub site.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-command-singlepartapppage
samples.title: configure a Page as Single App Part page
samples.description: Custom Command Set that set a Page layout to use the Single App Part page Layout

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-command-vision-api
samples.title: Image Metadata from Cognitive Services Vision API List View Command Set
samples.description: Custom Command Set that gets metadata information from MS Cognitive Services Vision API for the selected Image

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-dynamic-form-with-location-picker
samples.title: Dynamic Form with location picker
samples.description: This solution implements a simple Form Customizer with a Dynamic Form with a location picker, to demonstrate the many usages of a Dynamic Form.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-dynamic-site-form
samples.title: Dynamic Site Form
samples.description: The Dynamic Site Form solution implements a Form Customizer with a Dynamic Form with field overrides to look like the default SharePoint new site form.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-field-attachment-info
samples.title: Field Attachment Info
samples.description: This field customizer will display the attachment related information for a listitem.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-field-pnp-field-renderer-helper
samples.title: PnP Field Renderer Helper
samples.description: This field customizer shows how to use PnP FieldRendererHelper utility.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-field-pnp-file-type-renderer
samples.title: PnP File Type Renderer
samples.description: This field customizer shows how to use PnP FieldFileTypeRenderer controls.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-field-slider
samples.title: Slider Field Customizer
samples.description: The sample illustrates how to use Office UI Fabric React Slider in Field Customizer with permissions-base inline editing

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-field-text-analytics-api
samples.title: Field Customiser sample using Text Analytics API
samples.description: This sample shows how to use the Text Analytics API (Cognitive Services) to render a sentiment icon based on the text of a field in the List. The language is also auto-detected using the API, so it works with text based in any language supported by the API.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-field-toggle
samples.title: Toggle Field Customizer
samples.description: In this sample is possible to see how to implement Office UI Fabric React Toggle for the field yes/no through SPFx Extensions Field Customizers to modify in a quick way (inline editing) a list without opening the list item.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-field-unique-permissions
samples.title: Unique permissions on list items
samples.description: This sample demonstrates how to use field customizer to handle unique permissions on list items.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-field-user-permission
samples.title: Displaying the current user permission with PNPJs
samples.description: This sample shows how to use PNPJs to get the current users permission on the specific list item. Then a corresponding icon and text is shown in the field. For this sample I'm using simplified roles, so the code is is only checking for edit or read permissions.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-field-votes
samples.title: Field Votes
samples.description: An extension that displays Vote counter and button to vote or unvote.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-fx-extensions-react-formcustomizer-customers
samples.title: React Form Customizer (Customers)
samples.description: A sample of an SPFx Form Customizer built with React for managing items of a custom list of customers.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-hidefrom-externalusers
samples.title: Application Customizer Extension that is hidden from tenant guest users
samples.description: This sample shows how Application Customizer can be hidden from tenant external users. This is often the ask from the business when a SharePoint Framework App customizer or a web part has internal links that would be broken if a guest user attempts to access any or them.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-item-History
samples.title: Item History
samples.description: This listview command is used to show the past versions of the selected list item in a grid.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-jump-to-folder
samples.title: Jump to folder extension
samples.description: Sample solution that facilitates navigation between large collections of SharePoint library folders.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-mega-menu
samples.title: Mega Menu Application Customizer Extension
samples.description: This sample shows site mega menu. Application customizer is used along with SharePoint List to store the menu items.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-menu-footer-classic-modern
samples.title: Menu Footer Classic Modern
samples.description: This is a sample showing how to create custom headers and footers that work on classic pages using JavaScript injection, and on modern pages using a SharePoint Framework Application Customizer extension.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-msal-bot
samples.title: MSAL Bot Extension
samples.description: This sample demonstrates how to integrate a bot within a SharePoint Online portal supporting authentication to access Azure AD protected APIs like Microsoft graph resources. Behind the scenes, this sample implements the OAuth2 implicit grant flow using the MSAL JavaScript library.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-send-document
samples.title: Send Document With E-Mail
samples.description: This sample shows how to create Custom Dialogs using @microsoft/sp-dialog package in the context of Command View Set and send selected document with e-mail.

samples.name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-extensions-react-send-to-teams
samples.title: Send-To-Teams - Command Set
samples.description: This Command Set allows to create an adaptive card based on list data and send to microsoft teams chanel, The user can select the list fields that will show on the card.
